title: SOLD: 1906 Columbus Senators Team Photo Postcard - Only PSA Graded $100!
author: premiercardcollectors

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1906 Columbus Senators Team Photo Postcard - Only PSA Graded $100!
posts.post_content:
Includes SEVERAL Major Leaguers

POP 1 of 1.  Only graded example.

SOLD

PayPal, Venmo or Zelle no fee, Add $6 for shipping.

Thank you

The 1906 Columbus Senators roster:

Heinie Berger, Bert Blue, Lou Bruce, Manager Bill Clymer, Cy Coulter, Patsy Flaherty, Bill Friel, 
Ernie Groth, Bill Hinchman, Rudy Hulswitt, George Kihm, Ollie Pickering, Chick Robitaille, Jack Ryan,
Bucky Veil, Zeke Wrigley 

Below the team photo at the bottom reads "Columbus Base Ball Team for 1906.  Twice champions of 
the American Association".
